item.title: Boosting Productivity at Work: ServiceNow and Microsoft Combine AI Capabilities!
item.description: At Knowledge 2024, ServiceNow (NYSE: NOW) and Microsoft Corp. (NASDAQ: MSFT) announced an important partnership aimed at making work easier and more productive. By combining their advanced AI technologies, Now Assist and Microsoft Copilot, they aim to simplify tasks for employees and boost productivity in the workplace.
